cells.m_text_in:
@echo off
rem build script for the project
rem [button: Debug]
rem set LANG=zh_CN.utf8
jc --readable_c_code zmain.jc --run

# TODO LIST
module metadata
	per-module tags
		conflict / search
		links
	default values for ports
		function prototype and ...
		or not ports - JSON-like options:{
			method:'POST',
			uri:url,
			body:Buffer.concat(buf_package),
			encoding:null,
		}
	@ref=
		for in-port default values
		or just write values for in-ports like the out-ports
make newly-created classes connect to all dangling in-ports on selected nodes
new node interface in the panel
	not just completion, also show node details
	a node palette when nothing is selected
better node presentation
	we only need the port names when
		mouseover
		dragging port
	could display a MD normally
		as a "minimized mode"?
		or a thumbnail?
	auto-rebuild preview nodes
		nuke-like previews / widgets
drag-node-to-edge
git merging:
	https://github.com/dominictarr/xdiff
re-purpose the graph editor for shader editor?
	preview-only node class

cells.m_text_in:
@echo off
rem build script for 'c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc'
rem [button: Release]
cd /d c:/tp/qpad
jc -brelease -awin64 c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc
jc -brelease -awin32 c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc
cd bin\win32_release
del qpad3beta_32.7z
7z a qpad3beta_32.7z qpad.exe
cd /d c:\tp\qpad
cd bin\win64_release
del qpad3beta_64.7z
7z a qpad3beta_64.7z qpad.exe
del c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad_old.exe
ren c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad.exe qpad_old.exe
copy qpad.exe c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad.exe

cells.m_text_in:
#!/bin/sh
#[button: Translate]
cd /c/tp/qpad/res
grep -ERoh text:\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\) * > ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh UI\._\\\(\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\)\\\) * >> ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh UI\.Format\\\(\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\), * >> ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh tooltip:\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\) * >> ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh ,name:\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\) * >> ../build/translation.txt
